metadata.title: CVE-2024-34447

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP6
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Development Tools 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Development Tools 15 SP6
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP6

metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bouncy Castle Java Cryptography APIs before BC 1.78. When endpoint identification is enabled in the BCJSSE and an SSL socket is created without an explicit hostname (as happens with HttpsURLConnection), hostname verification could be performed against a DNS-resolved IP address in some situations, opening up a possibility of DNS poisoning.
